Asked who were his most difficult interviewees, Piers Morgan said: Ones who emerge as fairly imbecilic. Nick Clegg stands out; my GQ interview with him was a series of spectacular own goals. "I thought,' I hope he never ends up running the country' and, whoa- here he is. How can this guy be so powerful? It's frightening. Player for nearly 20 minutes, using his quickness to prevent Allen Iverson from even getting the ball, let alone shoot it.
